pli-tv-bu-vb-np4:0.5: 4. The training rule on used robes
pli-tv-bu-vb-np4:1.1: At one time the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in the Jeta Grove, Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np4:1.2: At that time Venerable Udāyī’s former wife had become a nun.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np4:1.5: And Udāyī shared his meals with that nun.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np4:1.6: One morning Udāyī robed up, took his bowl and robe, and went to her. He then uncovered his genitals in front of her and sat down on a seat.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np4:1.7: She too uncovered her genitals in front of him and sat down on a seat.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np4:1.8: Udāyī lustfully stared at her genitals, and he emitted semen.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np4:1.9: He then said to that nun:
pli-tv-bu-vb-np4:1.10: “Sister, get some water; I’ll wash the robe.”
pli-tv-bu-vb-np4:1.11: “Give it to me, Venerable, I’ll wash it.”
pli-tv-bu-vb-np4:1.12: She then took some of the semen in her mouth and inserted some into her genitals.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np4:1.13: Because of that she became pregnant.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np4:1.15: “This nun isn’t abstaining from sexuality; she’s pregnant.”
pli-tv-bu-vb-np4:1.16: She said, “Venerables, I do abstain from sexuality,” and she told them what had happened.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np4:1.17: The nuns complained and criticized Udāyī,
pli-tv-bu-vb-np4:1.18: “How can Venerable Udāyī have a nun wash a used robe?”
pli-tv-bu-vb-np4:1.20: The monks of few desires complained and criticized him,
pli-tv-bu-vb-np4:1.21: “How can Venerable Udāyī have a nun to wash a used robe?”
pli-tv-bu-vb-np4:1.22: After rebuking him in many ways, they told the Buddha. Soon afterwards he had the Sangha gathered and questioned Udāyī:
pli-tv-bu-vb-np4:1.23: “Is it true, Udāyī, that you did this?”
pli-tv-bu-vb-np4:1.27: “Foolish man, a man and a woman who are not related don’t know what’s appropriate and what’s inappropriate in dealing with each other, what’s inspiring behavior and what’s not.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np4:1.28: And still you got an unrelated nun to wash a used robe.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np4:1.29: This won’t give rise to confidence in those without it …
pli-tv-bu-vb-np4:1.30: And, monks, this training rule should be recited like this:
pli-tv-bu-vb-np4:1.31.1: ‘If a monk gets an unrelated nun to wash, dye, or beat a used robe, he commits an offense entailing relinquishment and confession.’”

pli-tv-bu-vb-np4:2.1.12: When it has been washed, it becomes subject to relinquishment.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np4:2.1.13: If he tells her to dye it, he commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np4:2.1.14: When it has been dyed, it becomes subject to relinquishment.

pli-tv-bu-vb-np4:2.2.1: If she is unrelated and he perceives her as such, and he gets her to wash a used robe, he commits one offense entailing relinquishment and confession.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np4:2.2.2: If she is unrelated and he perceives her as such, and he gets her to wash and dye a used robe, he commits one offense entailing relinquishment and one offense of wrong conduct.

pli-tv-bu-vb-np4:2.2.13: If she is unrelated, but he is unsure of it …
pli-tv-bu-vb-np4:2.2.14: If she is unrelated, but he perceives her as related …
pli-tv-bu-vb-np4:2.2.15: If he gets her to wash a used robe belonging to someone else, he commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np4:2.2.16: If he gets her to wash a sitting mat or a sheet, he commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np4:2.2.17: If he gets a nun who is fully ordained only on one side to do the washing, he commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np4:2.2.18: If she is related, but he perceives her as unrelated, he commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np4:2.2.19: If she is related, but he is unsure of it, he commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np4:2.2.20: If she is related and he perceives her as such, there is no offense.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np4:2.2.22: if a related nun does the washing and an unrelated nun helps her;
pli-tv-bu-vb-np4:2.2.23: if a nun does the washing without being asked;
pli-tv-bu-vb-np4:2.2.24: if he gets a nun to wash an unused robe;
pli-tv-bu-vb-np4:2.2.25: if he gets a nun to wash any requisite apart from a robe;
pli-tv-bu-vb-np4:2.2.26: if it is a trainee nun;
pli-tv-bu-vb-np4:2.2.27: if it is a novice nun;
pli-tv-bu-vb-np4:2.2.29: if he is the first offender.
